name: UnityGetProjectVersionTask
description: Gets the project version of a Unity project.
helpMarkDown: Use this task to find the last used Unity Editor version of a project. An output variable containing the found version is provided. [More Information](https://unitydevops.com/docs/unity-get-project-version-task).
author: Dinomite

inputs.name: unityProjectPath
inputs.label: Unity project path
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Enter the directory path to the Unity project. If no value is entered, the root of the repository will be used.

outputVariables.name: projectVersion
outputVariables.description: The project version found by the task for the specified Unity project.

outputVariables.name: projectVersionRevision
outputVariables.description: The Unity editor version revision found by the task for the specified Unity project.

messages.warningAlphaBetaVersion: You are using a Unity Alpha/Beta version. It may not be supported by the extension!
messages.projectPathInfo: Determining Unity editor version for project at
messages.failGetUnityEditorVersion: Fail, Unity editor version not found
